title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 3445 and H.R. 3979 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
April 23, 2018
On Monday, April 23, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 3445, the “AGOA and MCA Modernization Act,” which amends and provides additional authorities related to the African Growth and Opportunity Act and the Millennium Challenge Act;
andH.R. 3979, the “Keep America’s Refuges Operational Act,” which authorizes appropriations for programs that provide for the volunteer, community partnership, and educational activities of national wildlife refuges.
